<<  I am sad and disqusted with what has transpired this day. I am in sheer 
 shock of what has happened. The idea that some dumb fucks felt that they 
need 
 to kill innocent lives to prove thier point are beyond me. I wish I had one 
 chance to meet the bastards responsible for this and....but thats not 
 important. I wish to send out my hopes that no one in the rpg was hurt or 
 killed in this attack. I pray for all the victims and thier familes and 
 friends.  >>

My anger is great, I've always hated Bin Laden, Iran, and Palestinians and 
all other Arab terrorists who wish to harm America.  Especially after I 
recently stepped out of a cloak to further understand the world of politics.  
I've always hoped the Arab terrorists would be wiped out, and this only 
furthers my opinion in my own mind.  I hope America responds to these 
terrorist attacks swiftly and brutally and that Israel helps us in paying 
back Arab terrorists ten fold.  I'm obviously not happy, so I won't be 
posting today.
